item.title: 德国 "债务制动器 "在选举计划中得到保守党支持
item.description: 德国反对党保守派在一份政纲草案中表示，如果赢得明年的联邦大选，他们将维持宪法规定的借贷限额，并反对欧盟联合发债。【原文：Germany’s opposition conservatives said they’ll maintain the country’s constitutional borrowing limits and oppose joint European Union debt issuance if they win next year’s federal election, according to a draft platform.】

item.title: 中国持续通货紧缩对世界意味着什么？
item.description: 事实证明，中国陷入通货紧缩的漩涡难以收拾。这个世界第二大经济体的物价已连续六个季度下跌，如果再下跌一个季度，将创下上世纪 90 年代末亚洲金融危机时的通货紧缩纪录。【原文：China’s spiral into deflation is proving hard to fix. Prices in the world’s second-biggest economy have fallen for six consecutive quarters, and if they fall for one more quarter, the run would equal a record deflationary streak set in the Asian Financial Crisis in the late 1990s.】

item.title: 对冲基金更加看好汽油市场
item.description: 投机者转而看涨汽油期货，这是八个月来最看涨的一次，因为在明年可能出现供应紧张之前，低价可能会提供一个买入机会。【原文：Speculators turned the most bullish on gasoline futures in eight months, with low prices potentially offering a buying opportunity ahead of possible supply tightness next year.】

item.title: 穆迪因财政和政治风险下调斯洛伐克评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司将斯洛伐克的主权信用评级下调了一个等级，下调的原因包括对体制挑战和政治风险的担忧。【原文：Slovakia’s sovereign credit score was cut one notch by Moody’s Ratings, which cited concerns over institutional challenges and political risks among reasons for the downgrade.】

item.title: 日间交易者精神在市场最危险的边缘难以扼杀
item.description: 本周，国债收益率连涨五天，终于平息了美国大选后的股市热潮。但市场投机边缘的情况却并非如此，比特币及其蹿红的同类产品不断考验着投机热情的极限。【原文：A five-day runup in Treasury yields finally tamped down the post-election fervor in big US stocks this week. Not so at the market’s speculative edges, where Bitcoin and its memed-up cousins keep testing the limits of speculative zeal.】

item.title: 安防摄像头初创公司 Verkada 正在洽谈 45 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安防摄像头公司 Verkada Inc. 将以 45 亿美元的估值融资 2 亿美元，比上一轮融资大幅溢价。【原文：Security camera company Verkada Inc. is raising $200 million at a valuation of $4.5 billion, a significant premium over its last funding round, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储的 "中性 "利率是多少？为什么重要？
item.description: 中央银行试图通过设定利率水平来管理经济，从而鼓励或抑制购车和建筑项目等活动。这些努力围绕着一个处于中间位置的数字而展开，这个数字就是什么也不做的利率，也被称为中性利率。目前，这是一个重要的指导标准，因为随着大流行病时期的通胀岁月即将结束，发达经济体的货币政策制定者们都在削减利率，但他们并不希望中性利率过高。【原文：Central banks seek to manage economies by setting interest rates at levels that encourage or discourage activities such as car purchases and construction projects. These efforts revolve around a number that’s right in the middle — the rate that does nothing at all, also known as the neutral interest rate. It’s an important guidepost right now because monetary policymakers across advanced economies are cutting rates as the inflationary years of the pandemic period draw to a close, but they’re doi】

item.title: 英国天然气厂在价格飙升期间数小时内赚取数百万美元
item.description: 在本周风力微弱的几个小时内，两座燃气发电站各赚取了超过 100 万英镑（约合 130 万美元）。【原文：A pair of gas-fired power stations earned over £1 million ($1.3 million) each in a handful of hours this week when the wind was barely blowing.】

item.title: 比特币有望创三年多来最长周连胜纪录
item.description: 比特币有望实现连续第七周上涨，因为人们对特朗普政府对加密货币友好的乐观情绪不断升温，这将是三年多来最长的一次连涨。【原文：Bitcoin is on track for a seventh consecutive weekly gain, as growing optimism for a crypto-friendly Trump administration fuels what what would be the longest winning streak in over three years.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼称欧洲央行仅为帮助经济而减息并非正确做法
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）认为，欧洲中央银行降息的唯一目的是刺激经济，这样做是错误的。【原文：It would be wrong for the European Central Bank to cut interest rates with the sole purpose of stimulating the economy, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 超微计算机利用 Evercore 筹集资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，超微计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. has brought on Evercore Inc. to help the company raise capital, according to people familiar with the matter, as the embattled server maker looks to shore up its finances.】

item.description:

item.title: 生育连锁企业 Kindbody 称创始人巴塔西将离任首席执行官一职
item.description: 纽约生育连锁机构 Kindbody 的创始人吉娜-巴塔西（Gina Bartasi）即将辞去首席执行官一职。【原文：Gina Bartasi, the founder of the New York-based fertility chain Kindbody, is stepping down from her role as chief executive officer.】

item.title: 如果特朗普让除美国之外的其他地方物价都下降了，会怎样？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: OpenAI 称马斯克在称转变为 "非法 "之前曾支持营利结构
item.description:
这家初创公司发布了一系列新的电子邮件和信息，以回击这位亿万富翁。【原文：

The startup released a new trove of emails and messages to push back at the billionaire.

】

item.title: 华尔街最热门 ETF 交易之一的收费大战拉开序幕
item.description: 由于令人瞠目的回报和数十亿美元的资金流入，单一股票 ETF 成为华尔街今年最热门的交易之一。现在，一家发行商正在掀起一场收费战，以期脱颖而出，吸引新的资金。【原文：Single-stock ETFs have been one of Wall Street’s hottest trades this year thanks to eye-popping returns and billions of dollars in inflows. Now, one issuer is kicking off a fee war in a bid to stand out and attract new cash.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席执行官和 Perplexity 向特朗普就职基金捐赠 100 万美元
item.description: OpenAI的高层管理人员和人工智能搜索初创公司Perplexity分别向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职基金捐款100万美元，这表明人工智能公司正在努力巩固与即将上任的政府的关系。【原文：OpenAI’s top executive and AI search startup Perplexity are each donating $1 million to President-elect Donald Trump’s inaugural fund, a sign that artificial intelligence companies are trying to firm up relationships with the incoming administration.】

item.title: 美联储贴现窗口需要 "更多努力 "提高银行参与度
item.description: 美联储已采取措施，减少长期以来困扰其贴现窗口的污名，但最近的调查显示，银行仍对使用这一关键的支持机制犹豫不决。【原文：The Federal Reserve has taken steps to reduce the stigma that has long plagued its discount window, though recent surveys indicate banks are still hesitant to use the key backstop facility.】

item.title: 高盛集团的贝尔称英国股市需要本地资金来阻止移民潮
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：UK investors need to start allocating more capital to domestic stocks or London risks seeing more companies relist abroad or be taken private, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 加拿大将终止养老基金投资 30% 股权限制
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府将终止目前限制养老基金持有加拿大实体 30% 股份的规定，作为刺激更多国内投资计划的一部分。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government is set to end a rule that currently limits pension fund stakes to 30% of Canadian entities, as part of a plan to spur more domestic investment.】

item.title: 樱桃热潮让智利预测农业出货量将创历史新高
item.description: 水果出口大国智利预计，由于气候适宜和亚洲主导的强劲需求，下一季度的农业出货量将创下历史新高。【原文：Fruit-exporting powerhouse Chile expects to register record agriculture shipments in the coming season on favorable weather and strong Asia-led demand.】

item.title: 联合健康首席执行官谋杀案中再次出现 "无炸弹者 "宣言
item.description:
思想继续在网上传播。【原文：

The ideas continue to spread online.

】

item.title: 广播公司辛克莱正在与贷款人商谈融资 10 亿美元事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，辛克莱公司（Sinclair Inc.【原文：Sinclair Inc. and some of its lenders are hashing out a proposal to raise more than $1 billion in new financing to pay down some of its debt, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 巴西财政困难引发货币大跌，巴西央行出手干预
item.description: 在巴西财政前景恶化导致货币市场大跌之际，巴西央行介入了货币市场。【原文：Brazil’s central bank stepped into currency markets amid a selloff driven by the nation’s deteriorating fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 中国限制镓出口，镓价格升至 2011 年以来最高点
item.description: 在中国最近实施出口限制之后，用于半导体和先进技术的金属镓的价格跃升至 2011 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Prices for gallium — a metal used in semiconductors and advanced technology — jumped to their highest level since 2011 following export restrictions recently imposed by China.】

item.title: 必和必拓寻求在巴西实现增长，摆脱矿难阴影
item.description: 全球最大的矿商必和必拓集团（BHP Group）正寻求在巴西扩张，以摆脱 2015 年的矿难。【原文：BHP Group, the world’s biggest miner, is looking to expand in Brazil as it seeks to move on from a 2015 mining disaster.】

item.title: 纽约市相对生活成本降至至少 2008 年以来最低点
item.description: 至少 15 年来，纽约市的生活成本从未如此低廉过。【原文：It hasn’t been this cheap to live in New York City in at least 15 years — that is, when you compare it to the rest of the country.】

item.title: 卡拉-斯韦什尔和斯科特-加洛韦寻求与《Pivot》及其他播客达成八位数协议
item.description:
自 Vox Media 推出以商业为重点的计划以来，这对播客组合就一直与 Vox Media 合作

。【原文：

The podcaster duo have worked with Vox Media since the launch of their business-focused program

】

item.title: 德国监管机构调查电价飙升可能存在的滥用行为
item.description: 德国联邦网络局表示，正在调查与近期电价飙升有关的市场滥用指控。【原文：Germany’s Federal Network Agency said it’s investigating allegations of market abuse in connection with recent power price spikes.】
